meanings.definition: The action of establishing something again.
meanings.sent1: The reestablishment of the old library brought back many memories.
meanings.sent2: After the flood, the reestablishment of the town's infrastructure was a priority.
meanings.sent3: The reestablishment of the bedtime routine was met with resistance from the children.
meanings.sent4: Her reestablishment as the team captain sparked new energy among the players.
meanings.sent5: The reestablishment of the garden after the harsh winter was a labor of love.

meanings.definition: The act of restoring something to a previous condition or position.
meanings.sent1: The reestablishment of the antique clock made it look brand new.
meanings.sent2: The reestablishment of peace in the region was a long and difficult process.
meanings.sent3: The reestablishment of the old tradition brought joy to the community.
meanings.sent4: His reestablishment as the top chef in town was celebrated by food lovers.
meanings.sent5: The reestablishment of trust between the friends was a heartwarming moment.
